  • Method Details

    • viewCityList

      @GET @Path("/cities") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewCityList()
      Retrieves a list of all available cities. This method returns a static list of cities defined in `CITY_LIST`.
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of cities

    • viewCentresByCity

      @GET @Path("/gyms") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewCentresByCity(@QueryParam("city") @NotNull @Size(min=1) @NotNull @Size(min=1) String city)
      Retrieves a list of gyms located in a specified city. This method validates the city name before fetching the list of gyms from the service. If the city name is invalid, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      city - the name of the city for which gyms are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCentre objects or an error message

    • editProfile

      @PUT @Path("/profile") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response editProfile(@QueryParam("userId") @NotNull @NotNull String userId, @QueryParam("address") @Size(min=1) @Size(min=1) String address, @QueryParam("weight") @Min(0L) @javax.validation.constraints.Min(0L) double weight, @QueryParam("age") @Min(0L) @javax.validation.constraints.Min(0L) int age, @QueryParam("gender") @Size(min=1) @Size(min=1) String gender, @QueryParam("dob") @Size(min=10,max=10) @Size(min=10,max=10) String dob)
      Updates the profile information for a specific user. This method validates the input data including age, gender, weight, and date of birth before updating the user's profile with the new details. If any input data is invalid or the user ID is not found, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose profile is being updated
      address - the new address of the user
      weight - the new weight of the user
      age - the new age of the user
      gender - the new gender of the user
      dob - the new date of birth of the user, in the format "yyyy-MM-dd"
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the profile update

    • viewAllGyms

      @GET @Path("/gyms/all") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewAllGyms()
      Retrieves a list of all registered gyms. This method fetches and returns a list of all gyms registered in the system.
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCentre objects

    • viewAvailableSlots

      @GET @Path("/slots/available") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewAvailableSlots(@QueryParam("gymId") @NotBlank @NotBlank String gymId, @QueryParam("date") @NotBlank @NotBlank String date)
      Retrieves a list of all available slots. This method currently does not implement the logic to fetch available slots and returns a null response.
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of slots or a null response

    • bookSlot

      @POST @Path("/book") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response bookSlot(@QueryParam("userId") @NotNull @NotNull String userId, @QueryParam("slotId") @NotNull @NotNull String slotId, @QueryParam("bookingDate") @NotNull @Size(min=10,max=10) @NotNull @Size(min=10,max=10) String bookingDate, @QueryParam("cardNumber") @NotNull @Size(min=16,max=16) @NotNull @Size(min=16,max=16) String cardNumber, @QueryParam("cvv") @NotNull @Size(min=3,max=3) @NotNull @Size(min=3,max=3) String cvv, @QueryParam("cardExpiry") @NotNull @Size(min=5,max=5) @NotNull @Size(min=5,max=5) String cardExpiry)
      Books a slot for a user on a specified date. This method validates the booking date, payment information, and checks if the slot exists before processing the booking. If the slot is full or does not exist, or if there are validation errors, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user making the booking
      slotId - the ID of the slot being booked
      bookingDate - the date for which the slot is being booked, in the format "yyyy-MM-dd"
      cardNumber - the credit card number used for payment
      cvv - the CVV of the credit card used for payment
      cardExpiry - the expiry date of the credit card, in the format "MM/yyyy"
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the booking process

    • viewBookings

      @GET @Path("/bookings") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewBookings(@QueryParam("userId") @NotNull @NotNull String userId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings made by a specific user. This method fetches and returns all bookings for the given user ID. If no bookings are found, an appropriate message is returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitSlotBooking objects or an error message

    • cancelCustomerBooking

      @DELETE @Path("/bookings") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response cancelCustomerBooking(@QueryParam("bookingId") @NotNull @NotNull String bookingId)
      Cancels a specific booking. This method attempts to cancel a booking based on the provided booking ID. If the booking ID is invalid, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to be cancelled
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the cancellation
